hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.backbone

Class VectorOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.backbone.MatrixOp
      • hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix.backbone.VectorOp
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Vector3Op

    public class VectorOp
extends MatrixOp
    Implementations of the Matrix functions for the benefit of Vector subclasses. These methods rely on the Matrix.get(int, int), Matrix.set(int, int, double), Matrix.getRowCount(), and Matrix.getColumnCount() functions, so all others can delegate to this class.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba
